title: The White Arrows of Lorien (1C68)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Tale. Bearer must be an Elf companion. Archery: If bearer is an archer, exert bearer to make an opponent discard 2 cards at random from hand.
Lore:	Straight and true, the arrows of the Golden Wood are known to leave a deadly mark.
Rarity:	C
